thread.title: Gary Alexander
thread.title_full: Transport Luxury Auto reviewed by Gary Alexander

author: Gary Alexander
title: Gary Alexander
text:
We got the run around with the other companies they wanted a $100.00 deposit. They took my money but no truck, I would call and asked for a truck "Oh he'll be there any minute" they never showed. Our son's car is in Los Angeles and he goes to college in Atlanta, GA. We called Shane and he was on top of it. The driver called within an hour and the car was picked up on the same day Wednesday and delivered Saturday evening. WOW!
Now we know who to call for auto transport. Transport Luxury Auto, you guys are the best.
Thanks
